findings.title: Absence of validation step to verify the resource address of the Bucket against the vault's address
findings.description: The absence of a validation step allows depositing Buckets with differing token types into a vault, enabling the conversion of one token type to another and potentially leading to unrestricted generation of new XRD tokens.

findings.title: Lack of 2nd Resource Address Validation
findings.description: The 'put' function in the fungible vault does not validate the resource address of the Bucket against the vault's address, allowing for deposits of Buckets with differing token types into a vault.

findings.title: Insufficient Verification of Data Authenticity (CWE-345)
findings.description: The absence of a validation step to verify the resource address of the Bucket against the vault's address allows for the deposit of Buckets with differing token types into a vault, potentially leading to unrestricted generation of new XRD tokens.
